abstract: Michael Powell Sports of The Times column examines support of Missouri football coach Gary Pinkel for his players' plan to boycott games over accusations of mishandling race issues; holds Pinkel has taken an appearance of accidental revolutionary who does notg appear entirely comfortable with role in bringing down two key university officials.
lead_paragraph: Pinkel, the Tigers’ football coach, had to side with his players, but he did not appear to be entirely comfortable in the role of social revolutionary in bringing about the resignations of two key university officials.

headline.main: For Gary Pinkel at Missouri, an Evolution Followed by a Revolution
headline.print_headline: Evolution, Then Revolution, for Missouri’s Coach

snippet: Pinkel, the Tigers’ football coach, had to side with his players, but he did not appear to be entirely comfortable in the role of social revolutionary in bringing about the resignations of two key university officials.
